thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Scansource Reports Q2 Sales $1.032 Billion

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Scansource Reports Q2 Sales $1.032 Billion
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Scansource Inc:
* SCANSOURCE REPORTS RECORD QUARTERLY SALES * QUARTERLY NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.90 * SEES Q3 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.67 TO $0.73 * SEES Q3 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.44 TO $0.50 * QUARTERLY GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.31 * SEES Q3 2018 SALES $860 MILLION TO $920 MILLION * Q2 SALES $1.032 BILLION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.81, REVENUE VIEW $965.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.67, REVENUE VIEW $858.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
